而经过了两三集之后,有一种崇拜(Cult)已经明确地出现了.
Religion and Cult are extremely contradictory likeand fire and religion is the natural enemy of Cult.

She became a 21 cult figure and showed up in unlikely places.
她是人们顶礼膜拜的人物,并且常出现在意想不到的地方.
